resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157654</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157654</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1173</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lihitraot Lot! Avraham and Lot Separate1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lihitraot Lot! Avraham und Lot Separate1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sort de Lihitraot ! Avraham et sort 
Separate1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lote De Lihitraot! Avraham e lote Separate1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lotto Di Lihitraot! Avraham e lotto 
Separate1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρος Lihitraot! Avraham και μέρος 
Separate1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Porción De Lihitraot! Avraham y porción 
Separate1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan on Bereshit 13:5-11. After studying the text, learners act out the separation of Avram and Lot as described in the text. learners also learn roots of common Biblical words.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">avram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan auf Bereshit 13:5-11. Nachdem 
sie den Text studiert haben, fungieren Anfänger aus der Trennung von 
Avram und verlosen, wie in den Textanfängern beschrieben auch Wurzeln
der geläufigen biblischen Wörter erlernen Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon sur Bereshit 13:5-11. Après 
avoir étudié le texte, les étudiants agissent hors de la 
séparation d'Avram et divisent en lots comme décrit dans les 
étudiants des textes apprenez également les racines des mots 
bibliques communs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição em Bereshit 13:5-11. Após
ter estudado o texto, os learners agem para fora da separação de 
Avram e loteiam como descrito nos learners do texto aprenda também 
raizes de palavras biblical comuns.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione su Bereshit 13:5-11. 
Dopo avere studiato il testo, i principianti si comportano verso
l'esterno la separazione di Avram e dividono come descritto nei 
principianti del testo egualmente impari le radici delle parole 
bibliche comuni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος για Bereshit 13:511. Μετά 
από να μελετήσουν το κείμενο, η πράξη αρχαρίων έξω ο χωρισμός 
Avram και το μέρος όπως περιγράφεται στους αρχαρίους κειμένων 
μαθαίνουν επίσης τις ρίζες των κοινών βιβλικών λέξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección en Bereshit 13:5-11. 
Después de estudiar el texto, los principiantes actúan fuera 
de la separación de Avram y sortean como descrito en los 
principiantes del texto también aprenda las raíces de palabras 
bíblicas comunes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bereshit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">avram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bereshit</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bible</string>
          </keyword>
